thread.title: 'Huge explosions' rock Maiduguri, NE Nigeria
thread.title_full: 'Huge explosions' rock Maiduguri, NE Nigeria | News24

author: news24.com
title: 'Huge explosions' rock Maiduguri, NE Nigeria
text:
Maiduguri - Three blasts hit the city of Maiduguri in northeast Nigeria on Tuesday killing a number of people, locals and the Red Cross said.
The "huge explosions" happened in the Ajilari Cross area of the city, which has been targeted by similar attacks twice in the last month, including on September 20 when at least 117 were killed.
The previous attacks were blamed on Boko Haram, which has increasingly hit "soft" civilian targets in recent months using suicide bombers and improvised explosive devices.
It was not immediately clear what caused the latest blasts, which happened in quick succession from 20:10, said Bashir Mohammed, whose house is near the scene.
